formerly of New Kent Co. died
Seised of sd Land in sd Co. which

Ellis And Whereas Nathaniel Bacon
Burwell hath made Humble Suit &
hath obtained a G. for the same
which he Relinquished unto Anne
Hyde & Rebeckah Hyde.
